EmailTemplate.name: ASI OCR SG Send Notification Email
EmailTemplate.subject: [SG e-Archive] A {!ASI_OCR_Archived_Document__c.ASI_OCR_Document_Type__c} {!ASI_OCR_Archived_Document__c.ASI_OCR_Reference_Number__c} is received
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Please note the following document is received. Internal Reference: {!ASI_OCR_Archived_Document__c.Name} Document Type: {!ASI_OCR_Archived_Document__c.ASI_OCR_Document_Type__c} PO Number: {!ASI_OCR_Archived_Document__c.ASI_OCR_PO_Number__c} Supplier Invoice Number: {!ASI_OCR_Archived_Document__c.ASI_OCR_Supplier_Inv_Num__c} Brand Owner Invoice: {!ASI_OCR_Archived_Document__c.ASI_OCR_Payment__c} Disputed: {!ASI_OCR_Archived_Document__c.ASI_OCR_Disputed__c} To view the record, click this link: {!ASI_OCR_Archived_Document__c.Link}
